# Assignment 4

<u>Burrows-Wheeler Transformation</u>

### <u>GOAL</u>

Given a protein sequence perform the Burrows-Wheeler Transformation.


### <u>DATA</u>
A protein sequence.


### <u>Implementation</u>

<u>Define the sequence</u>

```python
seq = ''
```

<obr>
<u>Define a function that performs the transformation.</u>
<br>

```python
#Compute rotations
def bwt(seq):
    seq = seq + '$' 
    rotations = [seq[i:] + seq[:i] for i in range(len(seq))]  # This line performs all the rotations
    sorted_rotations = sorted(rotations) # Sort the rotations
    bwt_transformation = ''.join(row[-1] for row in sorted_rotations)
    return(bwt_transformation)
```

<u>Apply the function to the sequence.</u>
```python
print(bwt(seq))
```
